comments:
There are errors associated with the ToolBar under GTK 2.3.  GTK 2.3 is ABI
compatible with GTK 2.2, implying a break in GTK, or SWT is not honoring the
GTK2 API.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.launcher 4 0 Nov 17, 2003 09:58:25.188
!MESSAGE Exception launching the Eclipse Platform:
!STACK
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException:
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: java.lang.NullPointerException
